name: Adrift in Somnium
description:
You decide it would be a great idea to create a dungeon-crawler game from scratch in under a month. Everything goes well, until you suddenly pass out from overworking, only to wake up inside your own game world!

Explore the dungeon, collect artifacts, fight monsters, and reclaim your purpose!
  • 6 pseudo-randomly generated maps to explore
  • 5 unique enemies, and 2 boss fights
  • 23 different artifacts with unique effects
  • 7 different combat skills to try out
  • Randomly generated weapons and armour

~~~
